entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 5:42 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
